divs: Sighting Detailsthese guys have been hovering over the antelope valley for years now. i just found out about you guys and when i saw the news reporting about the ones in blue springs and melbourne I jumped up and cheered!! they flash all kinds of colors and hover in place for hours. right now there is one north east, north, north west of the antelope valley. there are up here almost every single week. I just done have a good enough camera to video shoot them. but if you guys have spotters in the a.v tell them to look up :) they are there
Summary: three hovering flashing ufo's same ones being investigated in blue springs and melbourne
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Palmdale
There were no other sightings in Palmdale on or around June 1st 2012
